text: 8:13 Ua Me Ini 23:14-17; 34:22-23; Dɨboboniba 28:9-15; 28:16--29:39; Godɨn Araziba 16:16Moses Osirizir Araziba mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, a dughiabar zurara ofabagh ami. A uaghan Sabatɨn dughiabar ofaba, ko iakɨnir igiabar dughiar ekiabar ofaba, ko azeniba vaghvagha, a 3plan dughiar ekiabar ofabagh ami. Dughiar ekiar 3plan kabar kara: Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiam, ko Azenibar Dagher Igiaba Asiamin Dughiamɨn Isar Ekiam, ko Averpenibar Ikiamin Dughiar Ekiam.
